runs.comm: length ball outside off stump, good lick, 87 mph, left alone outside off, like the Test series has never ended
movement into the left-hander there, strikes the thigh pad and runs wide of slip to get the innings underway
length outside off, pushed without moving the feet into the covers
full of length just outside off stump, pushed towards point
back of a length and quickly into position to pull to the square leg rope, timed very well
touch fuller but still short enough to swing away to the midwicket fence this time, another good strike
around the wicket onto middle and off, blocked back up the wicket
floated up outside off, swung at and missed, bit of turn
this skids on and Lumb goes to back cut and gets it to slip
played forward from just outside off to backward point
another skid-on delivery, this is punched back to the bowler
flighted spin this time, flicked at and missed

back of a length and pulled, this races away, well saved on the wide long on fence, the umpire has signalled for the third umpire because Lumb was very lazy stepping back into his ground, nearly costly but just back
beauty, down the wicket and driven in the air over extra cover, the timing was A1, that is smashed away
tighter line, blocked on the crease
too straight now though and it's flicked to the long leg boundary with the fielder up in the circle there
better, length on off stump, driven into the covers for a sharp single
Lumb tries to come down the wicket now, ends up having a bit of a thrash at it and gets a bottom edge towards square leg

swept at, missed, strikes the pad and given out lbw it looked pretty adjacent to off stump, he was a reasonable way down with a good stride so maybe it might have gone down with the angle but with a bit of grip it probably would have hit the stumps, a fair enough decision
length, tucked towards square leg
back in the crease and pushed through midwicket to one of two deep fielders out on the leg side
careful block off middle and leg into the on side, considered a single but turned it down, the bowler was on the scene quickly
nicely played with soft hands, tucked it around the corner past leg slip, long chase for deep square leg
deep square leg involved again as this is flicked from middle and leg over the infield
step away and slapping a length ball to cover
no-one in the stands though, lovely stroke this, couple of steps down and a gorgeous strike through the line, timing was excellent
and again, swept from off stump, this races to the backward square rope
now just carefully plays up on the off side coming forward
just outside off, cracked to extra cover
well outside off, too wide and left
again a forward press into the covers, this time they take on the fielder and get a run
a delay before releasing on a length to off stump, clipped through midwicket
a huge step outside leg, Ashwin followed him and Wright adjusted and tucked to midwicket
full of length, just clipped back to the bowler
full length again, another clean strike down the ground, sails into the crowd
full toss outside off, four more, cracked through cover, poor ball
this is a leg break, bizarre, leg stump and Hales gets it to short long leg
back of a length, cut past extra cover, a good bit of work on the cover rope sliding around
goes to cut and misses outside off, skidded on
same ball but this time Wright plays with soft hands and dabs it behind square
another cut and beats the chase of deep cover, another excellent stroke
much better delivery, no width and forces Wright to flick to the heavily-protected leg side, deep midwicket fields
short and wide again, and again crashed to the point fence
length ball on off stump - already better than Chawla - pushed into the covers

wide again now and cut straight to point, never a single there but they go for the run, a direct hit and Hales is going, he missed but Kohli surely had chance to get behind the stumps, which he failed to do
full toss outside off, spooned over cover
off stump, soft hands towards extra cover
full of length just outside off, Wright clears the front leg and slaps it down the ground, gets enough of it over the rope
full on off stump and pushed back up the wicket
off stump and pushed into the covers
forward with soft hands again, dropped into the covers once more
another push to cover
down the wicket, Yuvraj fired it in and Wright dug it down to long on
waited for, was going to sweep, then cut to point
swept of middle stump to deep backward square
good yoker, bit of pace this lad, blocked through cover
short of a length, goes to pull and it skids on quickly, bottom edge back towards the bowler
another good yorker, this is dug out past short long leg and deep backward square has to come around
short again but this time the pull stroke connects and gets it over midwicket and long on can't cut it off
full now and slapped hard down to long off
full ball dug back to the bowler who throws down the striker's end stumps but Hales was back in time

floated up and heaved down the ground, didn't get to the pitch and that will be safely pouched at long-off! Wright skipped out and tried to belabour Yuvraj over the fence, came off the toe of the bat and he knew that was going to the fielder as soon as he hit it
tossed up and pushed into a gap in the covers
touch short, straightening on middle and off stump, steps away and pokes one through the off side
tossed up and punched through the infield to the cover sweeper
skidding on a little quicker, chopped straight to point
floated up on leg stump, gets forward to push down the ground for another single to long-on
over the wicket, length ball outside off, plays with the turn to clip one through square leg
wide of the wicket, reaches out to slap one through point
sliding down the leg side, hit on the pad as Morgan gets neither back nor forward
clipped in front of square on the leg side, they think about a second but the fielder in the deep comes in quickly
tossed up and punched down the ground back past the bowler
length ball, turning past leg stump, flicks off the pads but the man on the circle stops it running for more than one
dropped, sharp chance but Dhoni's hands didn't move an inch as Morgan snicked a cut shot, it flicked the gloves and ran for one

slides on, Hales plays slightly the wrong line and is bowled! Double strike from Yuvraj, this didn't turn much, Hales advanced for a big ole blow down the ground and effectively played around it to lose middle pole
tossed up and nudged back past Yuvraj, Patel off the mark straight away

slogged straight up and Morgan is out too! Big wicket for India, Yuvraj gulling England's captain. It was flat, a bit quicker than Morgan expected maybe, and he sliced it high, high into the sky, the ball eventually lobbing gently to mid-on
much slower delivery, goes back, played towards mid-off
again tossed up outside the line of off, chopped through point off the back foot
legbreak wide of the off stump, pushed through the covers to the man in the deep
little bit of width, gets forward to push through the off side, Buttler off the mark
very full, drifting towards middle and leg, bunted flat down the ground to long-on
flatter, outside off, goes back and chops towards point, can't beat the man
short and a touch wide, gets more of the bat on this one and cuts in front of point
tossed up and pushed back down the ground to long-off
full, overpitched outside off and Patel punches wristily in front of deep extra-cover for a much-needed boundary, first since the 10th over
tossed up and pushed through the off-side infield
full, gets forward and drives down the ground to long-off
on the back foot, clips the ball to the man at extra-cover
short, on off stump, again goes back and drives with a flourish straight to the fielder
on the stumps, worked back down the ground for a single on the on side
on the stumps, nurdled through midwicket
short of a length on leg stump, dragged down a little quicker, Buttler tried to reverse his hands and ended up batting it in front of square on the off side
tossed up and punched back, Chawla doesn't grab it first time but they elect not to risk one as the ball bobbles past the non-striker's wicket
quicker ball, well outside off, goes back and misses trying to cut
tossed up in the channel, manages to carve this one through the covers to the sweeper
looped up outside off, possibly the googly, Buttler gets an inside edge behind square leg
flat, on the stumps, chipped down the ground to long-on on the bounce
pushed through wide of the stumps, squeezed through the off side
tossed up, skips down the ground and shovels another single towards long-on
advances, doesn't quite get to the pitch but drills back past the bowler to long-off
speared in towards off stump, slapped over cover on the up, picks out the fielder
fired in at the stumps, again can't get under it, manages to dribble it past Jadeja and they pinch another one
tossed up and pushed down the ground to long-on
legbreak from Ashwin, out the back of the hand, drags the ball right down and Buttler smears the ball over wide long-on for a big six
full and floated up straight this time, struck back over the bowler's head, off the toe of the bat and bounces to long-off
gets inside it, that's another big 'un, Patel this time smoking Ashwin over deep midwicket with an agricultural swing across the line
quicker ball on middle and off, clipped back past the bowler to long-off
tossed up, steps away and swings the arms, can't get the ball past the man at extra-cover

no, Patel holes out straight to long-off! Dinda went for the full bunger, it was in the slot but Patel didn't middle it and sent the ball flat and straight into the welcoming arms of Rahane, a couple of yards in from the rope
low full toss, rolled his fingers over it, Buttler seems to lose it and miscues back to Dinda - dot ball
goes for the ramp over short fine leg, pre-meditated move across the stumps, doesn't time it but the ball drops short of the fielder and they get one

Bresnan goes first ball, picks out Kohli coming in off the boundary at long-on! He had to plunge forward to take the catch, bags it well and he celebrates in the manner we've become accustomed to, eyes bulging, fists pumping
yorker, wide of the stumps, Buttler under edges through to the keeper
full and wide again, Buttler had back away and has to stretch to swing cross-batted towards long-on for another single
full, pitched up wide of off stump, drags it back past the bowler with a horizontal bat
angled across the left-hander Tredwell, driven on the half-volley through cover - a single brings Buttler back on strike
extraordinary from Buttler, that's why there's so much faith in him, stepping across to the off side and scooped over fine leg! That's gone all the way for six!
and again, slower ball out the back of the hand, Buttler goes back, waits for it and hits a four iron straight back down the ground, that's gone like a scud missile over long-off!
full and very wide, Buttler had gone to leg and has to throw his hands at it, manages to squeeze it low through point, very good running to come back for a second
good response from Awana, full and straight, right in the blockhole and dug out towards long-off for just a single
